name: Homer Saves the Day
description: Homer Saves the Day is be about an unwavering, dedicated baseball superstar named Homer Diamond who has to take on the AI robot takeover when they finally achieve sentience. The robots don’t know how to fight, but they know how to throw things with perfect trajectory, so Homer realizes he can save the day by using his hitting skills to rocket the robots’ projectiles back at them. He must fight his way through robot minions before facing the evil robot overlord, Strikeout.
